title: Green glory
creator_credit: Mushir Ahmad, M. Bhavnani and Documentary Films of India
brief_description: India has vast forest wealth, which has been steadily reduced by reckless felling. Now a vigorous effort is being made in conservation and afforestation to increase the national wealth.
creator_credit_for_label: Mushir Ahmad, M. Bhavnani and Documentary Films of India
